entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
